verbose_text: In conclusion, to the best of our knowledge, this is the first study to report that XC-302 may induce autophagy, which promotes the program of CNE-2 cell death probably by inhibition of the PI3K/AKT/mTOR signaling pathway.
evidence: promotes the program of CNE-2 cell death probably by inhibition of the PI3K/AKT/mTOR
